Html:
I changed music store to run in .NET 3.5 profile.

From VWD2010 IDE it runs OK.

I published it to local file system. Web.config file included in source code is present in root.

Typing http://localhost in browser returns error

 

HTTP Error 403.14 - Forbidden

The Web server is configured to not list the contents of this directory.

<fieldset><legend>Detailed Error Information</legend>
Module DirectoryListingModule
Notification ExecuteRequestHandler
Handler StaticFile
Error Code 0x00000000
Requested URL http://localhost:80/
Physical Path c:\myapp\web
Logon Method Anonymous
Logon User Anonymous
</fieldset>

 

How to fix this so that application can run under IIS ?

Andrus.
